"In SRPG combat, when you are attacked by an
opponent, you can take action in response!
Originally, when you can fight back with a
weapon, you attack. When you can't, you guard.
But bracelets can change this counterattack!
For example, if you equip the "Bracelet of
Strong Attack", you can use "Strong Attack"
When there are 2 or more skills to
